item.description:
Hello everyone!

We'll meet this month from 6:30p to 8p to practice speaking English. Maybe we'll go to supper afterwards.

Bring your grammar questions, or any books you think are helpful. We'll start with introductions or an icebreaker...activity to be decided later.

Hope you can join us, see you there!

Reece and Adam

The group will meet on the first floor of the Library, in the large reading room to the left of the Information Desk. We usually sit at one of the tables near the entrance, on the left.
If you don't find the group, you can ask the Information Desk for the 6:30p Meetup Group for English Conversation. It is not a regular BPL English group!
Have fun!

For more information, see http://www.bpl.org...

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston English as a Second Language May Meetup
